oosysteme

Class StrategyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • oosysteme.BaseObservable<StrategyType>
      • oosysteme.StrategyController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Observable<StrategyType>, Observer<StrategyType>, Repository<StrategyType,Strategy>

    public class StrategyController
extends BaseObservable<StrategyType>
implements Repository<StrategyType,Strategy>, java.lang.Runnable, Observer<StrategyType>
    StrategyController that controls and manages the strategies.
